text: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: Life is trying things, to see if they work.
author: Ray Bradbury

text: Leaders spend 5% of their time on the problem and 95% of their time on the solution. Get over it and crush it!
author: Tony Robbins

text: The highest level of wisdom is when you not only accept but love adversity.
author: Maxime Lagace

text: The best teacher is experience and not through someone's distorted point of view.
author: Jack Kerouac

text: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
author: Martin Luther

text: Sometimes it is more important to discover what one cannot do, than what one can do.
author: Lin Yutang

text: The most virtuous are those who content themselves with being virtuous without seeking to appear so.
author: Plato

text: You are not stuck where you are unless you decide to be.
author: Wayne Dyer

text: You know, the more one does the more one can do.
author: Amelia Earhart

text: We can have more than we've got because we can become more than we are.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Failure means you've now learned another valuable lesson that pushes you one step closer to success.
author: Steve Harvey

text: If you don't know, the thing to do is not to get scared, but to learn.
author: Ayn Rand

text: The difference between impossible and possible is a willing heart.
author: Lolly Daskal

text: Freedom lies in being bold.
author: Robert Frost

text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Exceptional thinkers ignore their critics and go about their business making history.
author: John Eliot

text: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future.
author: Earl Nightingale

text: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.
author: Voltaire

text: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
author: Les Brown

text: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
author: Criss Jami
